name: printed wiring board production, surface mounted, unspecified, Pb free | printed wiring board, surface mounted, unspecified, Pb free | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/1415/documentation

This dataset represents 1 kg of an unspecified, surface-mounted, PWB used in electronic devices. Main data are based on literature and own dismantling activities. Infrastructure and production efforts are based on own assumptions.;The composition of components is based on the printed wiring board for desktop and laptop computer.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]

From reception of solder materials at the factory gate.

This dataset  includes component input and production efforts (incl. PWB waste due to failure in mounting) for the production of an unspecified, surface mounted, PWB, using Pb-free solder material.
category: C:Manufacturing/26:Manufacture of computer, electronic and optical products/261:Manufacture of electronic components and boards/2610:Manufacture of electronic components and boards

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data represent a global valuable example for a unspecified, surface mounted, PWB.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Average PWB mounting technology (solder paste production line)

exchanges.description:
Typically, a printed wiring board (PWB) consists of a number of electric current conducting and non-conducting layers which are sandwiched together. Printed wiring boards are the interconnective electrical framework and physical structure that hold together the various electronic components.
EcoSpold01Location=GLO
